long.ar,hi,id:
Translate words and phrases while browsing the web, using Google Translate.
Translate while you read and write with Quick Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

You'll be able to translate effortlessly and instantly whatever you're reading or writing within Chrome. Select and right-click on any text and choose to translate this selection. 

Due to a language barrier, you no longer must worry about missing any information throughout the web. 

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Please note that this is a beta version, and we are continually improving. 

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them.


Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.


Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.


Translator is a language translator extension for text, voice, conversations. You can easily translate into over 100 languages by using our translator app.
New Offline Mode allows you to translate abroad without paying expensive roaming charges.

Translate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world.

FEATURES
• Text translator: Get free translation for text in over 100 languages.
• Translate text to speech: Listen to translation in male or female voices.
• Switch between different dialects when you translate.
• Dictionary & Thesaurus for all languages.
• Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more.
• Photo translator: With Translator, you can use your camera to translate menus, signs, and more instantly.
• Offline translation: Translate in over 40 Languages without an Internet connection.
• Voice translator: Translate Voice-to-Voice conversation and speech.
• Verb conjugations in different tenses.

Translate Translator supports languages & dialects:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sesotho, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

In search of a powerful language translator?
Want it to have an in-built camera translator, text translator, voice translator & ocr image translator, and to be available as an offline translator?

Introducing Lingvanex Translator, your superior language translator & language learning app. Use our practical voice translator, call translator or image translator to translate conversations, SMS messages, calls, conference chats, or just phrases you need at the moment.

Here are just some of the uses of our online & offline language translator:

🔁108+ LANGUAGE TRANSLATOR
Text, voice & camera translator for all the languages you need with different features.

🔊VOICE TO TEXT TRANSLATOR
Quickly translate text or voice messages. Use it for both prerecorded audios, im or sms messages, or write/speak to the app.

📢VOICE TO VOICE
Voice-to-Voice conversations in 100+ languages with translation into your native language. Record a call and use it as a phone call translator too.

📴OFFLINE TRANSLATOR
Unlike most language converters, Lingvanex offline mode allows you to use it abroad for offline translation without using expensive roaming.

🌎PERSONAL & BUSINESS USE
Translate Text, Voice, Images, Photo from camera, Screenshots, Sms, Conversations, Files, Websites, PDF documents making it perfect for both personal and professional use.

🔄ALL FEATURES IN DETAIL:
* Translate text in more than 100 languages
* Translate text on photos and images
* Translate websites and web pages
* Text to speech feature and voice synthesizer
* Use bookmarks to save your favourite translations
* Translate with widgets
* Memory cards will help you to learn new words
* Transliteration and transcription
* Dictionary meaning and alternate translations
* Supports Google Watch and Samsung Gear
* Translate with your headphones or bluetooth headset
* Translation keyboard can translate in any application
* Learn new phrases with travel phrasebook
* Translation history for text and images
* Recognize and translate objects with your camera
* Share translated text
* Voice translator. Speak and translate. Listen translated text.
* Translate messages in chat
* Offline translation


Use the translator for your travel journeys in 2022:
- translate text and voice in seconds
- translate question for local people,
- translate conversation in shops,
- translate signs and pointers.

Microsoft Translator is a free, personal translation app for more than 70 languages, to translate text, voice, conversations, camera photos and screenshots. You can also download languages for offline translation for free to use when you travel.

• Text translation into over 70 languages*, for online and offline use
• Camera translation to translate text within photos and screenshots
• Voice translation to translate speech, and a split-screen mode for two participants having a bilingual conversation
• Multi-person conversation translation - connect your devices and have in-person conversations with up to 100 people across multiple languages
• Phrasebooks for verified translations and pronunciation guides to help you learn important phrases in foreign languages when you travel
• Look up alternate translations and meanings of a word to find the best translation to express yourself
• Download languages for offline use for when you travel without an internet connection
• Hear your translated phrase out loud to help you learn how to say the translation
• View transliterations (pronunciation guides) to help you pronounce the translation (includes Pinyin support for Chinese)
• Share your translations with other apps
• Pin and save your most frequent translations for later
• Translate text in other apps through context menu translation

• Text translation: Translate between 108 languages by typing
• Tap to Translate: Copy text in any app and tap the Google Translate icon to translate (all languages)
• Offline: Translate with no internet connection (59 languages)
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera (94 languages)
• Photos: Take or import photos for higher quality translations (90 languages)
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly (70 languages)
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing (96 languages)
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference (all languages)
• Cross-device syncing: Login to sync phrasebook between app and desktop
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time (8 languages)

Right click on the word or phrase to translate using the Google Translator. Online translation
With this extension, you can quickly translate words on the web page you are viewing using a Google translator.

To do this, just right-click on the text or word you need and click on "Simple Translator" next to it. In a new tab, you will see the result.

You can also set your language in the extension settings. The translator will determine the language of the site where you are located.

You can translate between the following languages

Privacy policy:
Use the Chrome "Web Translator" extension at your own risk. Warranty not available. 
The author is not responsible for any damage or loss of data caused by the use of this extension. 
Using "Web Translator" means that you agree to these terms.

Convenient translator with two options: translate the text using double click to the word during the reading or copy and paste a big part of text to the popup of extension. 

Beautiful design of the extension allows you simply navigate across its functionality and choose the best color theme for you.

Read text fast with understanding every foreign word, because you can translate the full page at once using button in the context menu or in the popup of extension. 

Click to Translate also remembers the history of languages that you use and choose for the extension, so you don't need to choose it every time. Just add to the quick menu favourites.

Denial of responsibility:

The Chrome extension "Web Translator" has no relation to the popular site https://translate.google.com

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

You'll be able to translate effortlessly and instantly whatever you're reading or writing within Chrome. Select and right-click on any text and choose to translate this selection.

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Please note that this is a beta version, and we are continually improving. 

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them.


Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.


Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.

Saladict is an all-in-one professional pop-up dictionary and page translator which supports multiple search modes, page…
Web Translator is a professional inline translator

Looking Up Words Has Never Been Easier
  - Saladict supports mixed use of multiple search modes.
  - Whether it be single-click, double-click, pop-up icon, hovering or keyboard shortcuts, you name it.
  - The combination of dictionaries is dynamically adjusted according to search text and Saladict profile.

Good Words Are Kept, Safe and Sound
  - Saladict comes with search history and a vocabulary notebook.
  - Context of each word is captured and saved.
  - WebDAV synchronization, Anki card generation, Shanbay word list, or exporting plaintext in any format.

Multilingual Support, More Than You Expect
  - Although Saladict is built for looking up English words, it also supports many other languages.
  - Chinese (simplified and traditional), Japanese, Korean, French, German and Spanish are supported with dictionaries.
  - Other languages are supported with several machine translation services.
  - Each dictionary is well polished to a unify style for comfortable reading experience.

Reading Foreign Essay Is a Piece of “Paper”
  - Saladict has three default profiles - Scholar Mode, Translation Mode and Sentence Mode.
  - These may come in handy when reading, translating and writing essays in foreign language.
  - There is also a build-in PDF viewer which can be used in conjunction with sidebar-mode standalone search panel.

Translate while you read and write with DeepL Translate, the world’s most accurate translator.
With the DeepL for Chrome extension, you can enjoy DeepL’s unbeatable translation quality without ever leaving your browser.

You’ll be able to effortlessly and instantly translate as you’re reading or writing within Chrome. If you’re a DeepL Pro user, that includes entire web pages. 
If you’re a free user, we’re working on releasing this feature for you too. Until then, you can simply select any text and the DeepL icon will appear. To translate your selection, click on the icon. If you want to translate even faster, set up your own shortcuts in the settings, for both reading or writing with DeepL on Chrome.

Now you no longer have to worry about missing out on any information throughout the web due to a language barrier. 

Download DeepL for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Translate while reading
You won’t have to skip emails, articles, or websites anymore. You can view the content you’re browsing in Chrome in your chosen language, in its original context. 

Translate your writing
Whether you’re writing a social media post, chat message, or email, you can translate your own words immediately after you type them. This means you no longer have to copy, paste, retype, or leave Chrome to communicate in another language.

Full-page translations
If you’re a DeepL Pro user, you can translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. To make things even easier, you can choose to have all websites in specific languages automatically translated for a seamless browsing experience. We’re working on releasing this feature for free users too. 

DeepL Pro login 
DeepL Pro users can log in to their accounts through the extension.

Shortcuts
Use simple shortcuts to make translation quicker and easier. You can set your own shortcuts in the settings.

Unparalleled accuracy
You can rest assured that you’re getting the best possible translations on the website or application you’re using. DeepL translations consistently outperform the competition and are proven to be three times more accurate than translations from major tech companies.

Loved by millions of users
Millions of people around the world use DeepL every day to improve their communication.

Choose between 27 languages
For a list of the languages available in the extension, check out this article in our Help Center: https://support.deepl.com/hc/en-us/articles/4407573562386-Languages-in-the-browser-extension

Aquest traductor és el vostre ajudant diari per traduir una paraula, una frase o un article sencer desconeguts. És una manera senzilla i ràpida de traduir text a un altre idioma sense deixar de treballar.

Tradueix mentre llegeixes i escrius amb Web Translate, el traductor més precís del món.

Amb aquest traductor, podeu gaudir d'una qualitat de traducció immillorable de Google Translate sense sortir del vostre navegador.

Podreu traduir sense esforç i a l'instant el que estigueu llegint o escrivint a Chrome. Seleccioneu i feu clic amb el botó dret sobre qualsevol text i trieu traduir aquesta selecció.

A causa d'una barrera lingüística, ja no us haureu de preocupar per perdre cap informació a la web.

Baixeu el traductor per a Chrome gratuïtament per començar a traduir avui mateix.

FUTUR

Tradueix mentre llegeix
Aprèn un idioma llegint el que vulguis. Tradueix paraules i frases en directe a qualsevol pàgina web. Feu clic a paraules o frases de qualsevol lloc per traduir-les.

Tradueix el teu escrit
Amb el traductor, podeu escriure el vostre contingut a la part superior de la finestra emergent i obtenir la traducció a la part inferior. Totes les traduccions (com ara el francès, l'alemany, l'espanyol, l'àrab i noranta-set idiomes més) estan impulsades per traduccions automàtices neuronals de Google Translate que tradueixen el vostre contingut amb precisió.

Fes doble clic a la traducció
Podreu traduir fent doble clic per obtenir una traducció ràpida de paraules.

Text a veu
Utilitzeu la funció TTS que us ajuda a aprendre com sonen les paraules i la transcripció fonètica.

Tento překladač je vaším každodenním pomocníkem při překladu neznámého cizího slova, věty nebo celého článku. Je to jednoduchý a rychlý způsob, jak přeložit text do jiného jazyka, aniž byste museli přestat pracovat.

Překládejte při čtení a psaní pomocí Webového překladu, nejpřesnějšího překladače na světě.

S tímto překladačem si můžete užívat nepřekonatelnou kvalitu překladu Google Translate, aniž byste museli opustit prohlížeč.

Budete moci bez námahy a okamžitě překládat cokoli, co čtete nebo píšete v prohlížeči Chrome. Vyberte a klikněte pravým tlačítkem na libovolný text a zvolte překlad tohoto výběru.

Vzhledem k jazykové bariéře se již nemusíte obávat, že by vám na webu chyběly nějaké informace.

Stáhněte si zdarma překladač pro Chrome a začněte překládat ještě dnes.

BUDOUCNOST

Překládejte při čtení
Naučte se jazyk čtením, co chcete. Překládejte slova a fráze živě na jakékoli webové stránce. Klikněte na slova nebo fráze na libovolném webu a přeložte je.

Přeložte své psaní
Pomocí překladače můžete napsat svůj obsah v horní části vyskakovacího okna a překlad zobrazit ve spodní části. Všechny překlady (např. francouzština, němčina, španělština, arabština a devadesát sedm dalších jazyků) jsou založeny na neuronových strojových překladech od Překladače Google, který přesně přeloží váš obsah.

Překlad dvojitým kliknutím
Dvojitým kliknutím budete moci překládat a získáte rychlý překlad slov.

Text na řeč
Použijte funkci TTS, která vám pomůže naučit se, jak slova zní, a také fonetický přepis.

Celostránkové překlady
Přeložte celé webové stránky do požadovaného jazyka jediným kliknutím. Toto je nová funkce, kterou Google Translator poskytuje zdarma a kterou jsme integrovali do našeho překladače.

Historie překladů
Veškerá historie překladů je uložena v místním úložišti vašeho prohlížeče. Chcete-li najít nebo smazat svou historii překladů, klikněte na ikonu rozšíření v pravém horním rohu prohlížeče. Poté ve vyskakovacím okně klikněte na ikonu „Zobrazit historii překladů“. Tento překladač nepoužívá žádné cloudové úložiště. Po odebrání rozšíření tedy bude veškerá vaše historie překladů smazána z místního úložiště prohlížeče bez možnosti obnovení.
long.da:
Denne oversætter er din daglige hjælper til at oversætte et ukendt fremmedord, en sætning eller en hel artikel. Det er en enkel og hurtig måde at oversætte tekst til et andet sprog uden at bryde væk fra arbejdet.

Oversæt, mens du læser og skriver med Web Translate, verdens mest nøjagtige oversætter.

Med denne oversætter kan du nyde Google translate uovertruffen oversættelseskvalitet uden at forlade din browser.

Du vil uden besvær og øjeblikkeligt være i stand til at oversætte, hvad end du læser eller skriver i Chrome. Vælg og højreklik på en tekst, og vælg at oversætte denne markering.

På grund af en sprogbarriere skal du ikke længere bekymre dig om at gå glip af information overalt på nettet.

Download oversætter til Chrome gratis for at begynde at oversætte i dag.

FREMTID

Oversæt, mens du læser
Lær et sprog ved at læse, hvad du kan lide. Oversæt ord og sætninger live på enhver webside. Klik på ord eller sætninger på ethvert websted for at oversætte dem.

Oversæt din tekst
Med oversætteren kan du skrive dit indhold øverst i pop op-vinduet og få oversættelsen nederst. Alle oversættelser (såsom fransk, tysk, spansk, arabisk og 97 andre sprog) er drevet af neurale maskinoversættelser fra Google Translate, der nøjagtigt oversætter dit indhold.

Dobbeltklik på oversættelse
Du vil være i stand til at oversætte ved at dobbeltklikke for at få en hurtig oversættelse af ord.

Tekst til tale
Brug TTS-funktion, der hjælper dig med at lære, hvordan ord lyder såvel som fonetisk transskription.

Helsides oversættelser
Oversæt hele websider til dit ønskede sprog med et enkelt klik. Dette er en ny funktion leveret af Google Translator gratis, som vi har integreret i vores oversætter.

Oversættelseshistorie
Al oversættelseshistorik gemmes i din browsers lokale lager. For at finde eller slette din oversættelseshistorik skal du klikke på udvidelsesikonet i øverste højre hjørne af din browser. Klik derefter på ikonet "Vis oversættelseshistorik" i pop op-vinduet. Denne oversætter bruger ikke noget cloudlager. Derfor vil al din oversættelseshistorik blive slettet fra browserens lokale lager, efter at du har fjernet udvidelsen, uden mulighed for gendannelse.

Dieser Übersetzer ist Ihr täglicher Helfer, um ein unbekanntes Fremdwort, einen Satz oder einen ganzen Artikel zu übersetzen. Es ist eine einfache und schnelle Möglichkeit, Text in eine andere Sprache zu übersetzen, ohne die Arbeit unterbrechen zu müssen.

Übersetzen Sie, während Sie lesen und schreiben, mit Web Translate, dem genauesten Übersetzer der Welt.

Mit diesem Übersetzer können Sie die unschlagbare Übersetzungsqualität von Google Translate genießen, ohne Ihren Browser zu verlassen.

Sie können alles, was Sie in Chrome lesen oder schreiben, mühelos und sofort übersetzen. Wählen Sie einen beliebigen Text aus, klicken Sie mit der rechten Maustaste darauf und wählen Sie, ob Sie diese Auswahl übersetzen möchten.

Aufgrund einer Sprachbarriere müssen Sie sich keine Sorgen mehr machen, im gesamten Web Informationen zu verpassen.

Laden Sie den Übersetzer für Chrome kostenlos herunter, um noch heute mit dem Übersetzen zu beginnen.

ZUKUNFT

Beim Lesen übersetzen
Lerne eine Sprache, indem du liest, was du magst. Übersetzen Sie Wörter und Sätze live auf jeder Webseite. Klicken Sie auf Wörter oder Sätze auf einer beliebigen Website, um sie zu übersetzen.

Übersetze dein Geschriebenes
Mit dem Übersetzer können Sie Ihren Inhalt oben in das Popup schreiben und die Übersetzung unten abrufen. Alle Übersetzungen (wie Französisch, Deutsch, Spanisch, Arabisch und siebenundneunzig andere Sprachen) werden von neuronalen maschinellen Übersetzungen von Google Translate unterstützt, die Ihre Inhalte genau übersetzen.

Übersetzung doppelklicken
Sie können per Doppelklick übersetzen, um eine schnelle Übersetzung von Wörtern zu erhalten.

Text zu Sprache
Verwenden Sie die TTS-Funktion, mit der Sie lernen, wie Wörter klingen, sowie die phonetische Transkription.

Ganzseitige Übersetzungen
Übersetzen Sie ganze Webseiten mit nur einem Klick in die gewünschte Sprache. Dies ist eine neue Funktion, die von Google Translator kostenlos zur Verfügung gestellt wird und die wir in unseren Übersetzer integriert haben.

Übersetzungsgeschichte
Der gesamte Übersetzungsverlauf wird im lokalen Speicher Ihres Browsers gespeichert. Um Ihren Übersetzungsverlauf zu finden oder zu löschen, klicken Sie auf das Erweiterungssymbol in der oberen rechten Ecke Ihres Browsers. Klicken Sie dann im Popup-Fenster auf das Symbol "Übersetzungsverlauf anzeigen". Dieser Übersetzer verwendet keinen Cloud-Speicher. Daher wird nach dem Entfernen der Erweiterung Ihr gesamter Übersetzungsverlauf aus dem lokalen Speicher des Browsers ohne die Möglichkeit einer Wiederherstellung gelöscht.

Με αυτήν την επέκταση, μπορείτε να μεταφράσετε γρήγορα λέξεις στην ιστοσελίδα που προβάλλετε χρησιμοποιώντας έναν μεταφραστή Google.

Για να το κάνετε αυτό, απλώς κάντε δεξί κλικ στο κείμενο ή τη λέξη που χρειάζεστε και κάντε κλικ στο "Απλός μεταφραστής" δίπλα του. Σε μια νέα καρτέλα, θα δείτε το αποτέλεσμα.

Μπορείτε επίσης να ορίσετε τη γλώσσα σας στις ρυθμίσεις επέκτασης. Ο μεταφραστής θα καθορίσει τη γλώσσα του ιστότοπου στον οποίο βρίσκεστε.

Μπορείτε να μεταφράσετε μεταξύ των παρακάτω γλωσσών

Πολιτική απορρήτου:
Χρησιμοποιήστε την επέκταση χρωμίου "Simple tanslator" με δική σας ευθύνη. Η εγγύηση δεν είναι διαθέσιμη.
Ο συγγραφέας δεν ευθύνεται για οποιαδήποτε ζημιά ή απώλεια δεδομένων που προκαλείται από τη χρήση αυτής της επέκτασης.
Η χρήση του "μεταφραστή" σημαίνει ότι συμφωνείτε με αυτούς τους όρους.

Άρνηση ευθύνης:
Η επέκταση Chrome "μεταφραστής" δεν έχει καμία σχέση με τον δημοφιλή ιστότοπο https://translate.google.com
Όλα τα πνευματικά δικαιώματα ανήκουν στους αντίστοιχους ιδιοκτήτες τους.
Η Google δεν υποστηρίζει ούτε χορηγεί αυτήν την επέκταση Chrome.
Αυτή η επέκταση Chrome δεν είναι ιδιοκτησία, άδεια ή θυγατρική της Google Inc.

Όλα τα πνευματικά δικαιώματα ανήκουν στους κατόχους τους.

Μεταφραστής ιστοσελίδας, άμεση μετάφραση επιλεγμένου κειμένου, αναδυόμενη μετάφραση, υποστηρίζει 103 γλώσσες, ενσωματωμένο TTS μετατροπής κειμένου σε ομιλία.
Ο μεταφραστής Ιστού είναι ο απόλυτος μεταφραστής για τις ανάγκες περιήγησής σας στον Ιστό. Αυτή η επέκταση προσφέρει άμεση μετάφραση επιλεγμένου κειμένου με ένα μόνο κλικ, παρέχοντας έναν εύκολο και γρήγορο τρόπο μετάφρασης ιστοσελίδων.

Με υποστήριξη για 103 γλώσσες, αυτός ο μεταφραστής σας καλύπτει ανεξάρτητα από το πού πηγαίνετε στον Ιστό. Η δυνατότητα αναδυόμενης μετάφρασης εξαλείφει την ανάγκη να εγκαταλείψετε τη σελίδα ή να αντιγράψετε και να επικολλήσετε κείμενο σε ένα ξεχωριστό εργαλείο μετάφρασης.

Η ενσωματωμένη λειτουργία μετατροπής κειμένου σε ομιλία (TTS) προσθέτει ένα εντελώς νέο επίπεδο άνεσης στην εμπειρία μετάφρασης της ιστοσελίδας σας. Είτε είστε ταξιδιώτης, φοιτητής ή απλά κάποιος που θέλει να κατανοήσει ξενόγλωσσο περιεχόμενο, ο μεταφραστής Ιστού είναι ο απόλυτος μεταφραστής για εσάς.

Αυτή η επέκταση είναι φιλική προς το χρήστη και εύκολη στη χρήση. Απλώς επιλέξτε το κείμενο που θέλετε να μεταφράσετε και η αναδυόμενη μετάφραση θα εμφανιστεί σε ελάχιστο χρόνο.

Η ενσωματωμένη λειτουργία TTS παρέχει μια ηχητική έκδοση του μεταφρασμένου κειμένου, καθιστώντας το ιδανικό για όσους προτιμούν να ακούν αντί να διαβάζουν.

Περιηγηθείτε στον Ιστό με σιγουριά και μεταφράστε εύκολα όποιο κείμενο συναντήσετε. Η διαδικασία μετάφρασης είναι γρήγορη και ακριβής, διασφαλίζοντας ότι λαμβάνετε την πιο ακριβή δυνατή μετάφραση.

Επιπλέον, αυτή η επέκταση είναι εξαιρετικά προσαρμόσιμη, επιτρέποντάς σας να επιλέξετε τη γλώσσα που προτιμάτε για μετάφραση και να προσαρμόσετε άλλες ρυθμίσεις ανάλογα με τις ανάγκες σας. Είτε τη χρησιμοποιείτε για επαγγελματικούς, εκπαιδευτικούς ή προσωπικούς σκοπούς, αυτή η επέκταση θα κάνει την εμπειρία περιήγησής σας στον ιστό πιο ομαλή και αποτελεσματική.

Επομένως, εάν αναζητάτε έναν αξιόπιστο και αποτελεσματικό μεταφραστή ιστοσελίδων, μην ψάξετε περισσότερο από αυτό το εργαλείο μετάφρασης. Αποκτήστε το τώρα και αρχίστε να απολαμβάνετε απρόσκοπτη και αβίαστη μετάφραση στον Ιστό.

Translate words and phrases while browsing the web, using Google Translate.
Translate while you read and write with Quick Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

You'll be able to translate effortlessly and instantly whatever you're reading or writing within Chrome. Select and right-click on any text and choose to translate this selection. 

Due to a language barrier, you no longer must worry about missing any information throughout the web. 

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Please note that this is a beta version, and we are continually improving. 

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them.


Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.


Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.

Multilanguage Translator the best and easiest way to quickly translate part of the content that you need, such as words, phrases, or even menu items. 

Highlight the word or text you want to translate and you will immediately see the translation into your language. All in one simple and understandable browser extension. 

➖ Completely free. Doesn't require registration or any subscriptions;
➖ Supports over 120 languages;
➖ Automatic language detection;
➖ Text voice acting for 60 languages; 
➖ Reverse translation; 
➖ Works on all sites including Gmail, Facebook, Twitter and others;
➖ Convenient and intuitive user interface of the extension;
➖ Translating words using a dictionary (+ dictionary works offline).

Quick Translator reads and reproduces words, phrases and entire texts using quality human text-to-speech (TTS) translation. It shows transcription and transliteration, also knows how to reproduce words or texts with the correct accent and with correct stress. Learn the correct pronunciation words right away, without postponing it for later!

Functionality:

✔️ Web page Translation - full web page translation with mouse hover translation

✔️ Dictionary  -  Word meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, hypernyms, hyponyms and more.

✔️ Bookmarks  - Keeps track of all the changes you made to your bookmarks. Saving translation history.

✔️ Text to speech - Hear correct pronunciation and play words and texts with correct accent.

✔️ Image translation (image recognition) - Just select the area on the monitor that you want to translate (the principle of work is as in the screenshot tool).

In the new version of the extension, we have added the ability to select translators. Now you do not need to install additional programs or applications to use Google Translate, all in one convenient extension, with all the features that are available for the Quick Translator.

Text-to-speech 
Use TTS function that helps you learn how words sound as well as phonetic transcription.

Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Just choose which translator you want to use today: Quick Translator or Google Translate.

We really hope that our translator will be useful to you! We look forward to your feedback and ratings!
long.es:
Este traductor es su ayudante diario para traducir una palabra extranjera desconocida, una oración o un artículo completo. Es una forma simple y rápida de traducir texto a otro idioma sin interrumpir el trabajo.

Traduce mientras lees y escribes con Web Translate, el traductor más preciso del mundo.

Con este traductor, puede disfrutar de una calidad de traducción inmejorable del traductor de Google sin salir de su navegador.

Podrás traducir sin esfuerzo y al instante lo que estés leyendo o escribiendo en Chrome. Seleccione y haga clic derecho en cualquier texto y elija traducir esta selección.

Debido a la barrera del idioma, ya no debe preocuparse por perder información en la web.

Descarga traductor para Chrome gratis para comenzar a traducir hoy.

FUTURO

Traduce mientras lees
Aprende un idioma leyendo lo que quieras. Traduce palabras y frases en vivo en cualquier página web. Haga clic en palabras o frases en cualquier sitio para traducirlas.

Traduce tu escrito
Con el traductor, puede escribir su contenido en la parte superior de la ventana emergente y obtener la traducción en la parte inferior. Todas las traducciones (como francés, alemán, español, árabe y otros noventa y siete idiomas) funcionan con traducciones automáticas neuronales de Google Translate que traduce con precisión su contenido.

Traducción de doble clic
Podrá traducir haciendo doble clic para obtener una traducción rápida de las palabras.

Texto a voz
Use la función TTS que lo ayuda a aprender cómo suenan las palabras y la transcripción fonética.

Traducciones de página completa
Traduce páginas web completas al idioma que desees con solo un clic. Esta es una nueva función proporcionada por Google Traductor de forma gratuita que integramos en nuestro traductor.

Historial de traducción
Todo el historial de traducción se almacena en el almacenamiento local de su navegador. Para buscar o eliminar su historial de traducción, haga clic en el icono de la extensión en la esquina superior derecha de su navegador. Luego haga clic en el ícono "Mostrar historial de traducción" en la ventana emergente. Este traductor no utiliza ningún almacenamiento en la nube. Por lo tanto, después de eliminar la extensión, todo su historial de traducción se eliminará del almacenamiento local del navegador sin posibilidad de recuperación.
long.et:
Selle laienduse abil saate vaadatava veebilehe sõnu kiiresti Google'i tõlkija abil tõlkida.

Selleks paremklõpsake vajalikul tekstil või sõnal ja klõpsake selle kõrval "Lihtne tõlkija". Tulemust näete uuel vahekaardil.

Keele saate määrata ka laienduse seadetes. Tõlkija määrab teie asukoha saidi keele.

Saate tõlkida järgmiste keelte vahel

Privaatsuspoliitika:
Kasutage kroomitud laiendust "Simple tanslator" omal vastutusel. Garantii ei kehti.
Autor ei vastuta selle laienduse kasutamisest põhjustatud kahjude või andmete kaotsimineku eest.
"Tõlkija" kasutamine tähendab, et nõustute nende tingimustega.

Vastutusest keeldumine:
Chrome'i laiendusel "tõlkija" pole mingit seost populaarse saidiga https://translate.google.com
Kõik autoriõigused kuuluvad nende vastavatele omanikele.
Google ei toeta ega sponsoreeri seda Chrome'i laiendust.
See Chrome'i laiendus ei kuulu ettevõttele Google Inc, see ei ole selle litsentsiga ega tütarettevõte.

Kõik autoriõigused kuuluvad nende omanikele.

Veebilehtede tõlkija, tõlgib koheselt valitud teksti, hüpiktõlge, toetab 103 keelt, sisseehitatud tekst kõneks muutev TTS.
Veebitõlk on teie veebisirvimise vajaduste jaoks parim tõlkija. See laiendus pakub valitud teksti kohest tõlkimist ühe klõpsuga, pakkudes lihtsat ja kiiret viisi veebilehtede tõlkimiseks.

Tänu 103 keele toele pakub see tõlkija teid kõikjal veebis. Hüpiktõlkefunktsioon välistab vajaduse lehelt lahkuda või teksti kopeerida ja kleepida eraldi tõlketööriista.

Sisseehitatud tekst kõneks muutmise (TTS) funktsioon lisab teie veebilehtede tõlkimise kogemusele täiesti uue mugavuse taseme. Ükskõik, kas olete reisija, üliõpilane või lihtsalt keegi, kes soovib võõrkeelset sisu mõista, on veebitõlkija teie jaoks parim tõlkija.

See laiendus on kasutajasõbralik ja hõlpsasti kasutatav. Valige lihtsalt tekst, mida soovite tõlkida ja hüpiktõlge ilmub kiiresti.

Sisseehitatud TTS-funktsioon pakub tõlgitud tekstist heliversiooni, muutes selle ideaalseks neile, kes eelistavad lugemise asemel kuulata.

Sirvige veebi enesekindlalt ja tõlkige hõlpsalt mis tahes teksti, mis teile ette tuleb. Tõlkeprotsess on kiire ja täpne, tagades teile võimalikult täpse tõlke.

Lisaks on see laiendus väga kohandatav, võimaldades teil valida tõlkimiseks eelistatud keele ja kohandada muid seadeid vastavalt teie vajadustele. Olenemata sellest, kas kasutate seda äri-, haridus- või isiklikel eesmärkidel, muudab see laiendus teie veebisirvimise sujuvamaks ja tõhusamaks.

Seega, kui otsite usaldusväärset ja tõhusat veebilehtede tõlkijat, otsige sellest tõlketööriistast kaugemale. Hankige see kohe ja nautige sujuvat ja vaevatut tõlkimist veebis.

Translate words and phrases while browsing the web, using Google Translate.
Translate while you read and write with Quick Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

You'll be able to translate effortlessly and instantly whatever you're reading or writing within Chrome. Select and right-click on any text and choose to translate this selection. 

Due to a language barrier, you no longer must worry about missing any information throughout the web. 

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Please note that this is a beta version, and we are continually improving. 

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them.


Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.


Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.


Translator is a language translator extension for text, voice, conversations. You can easily translate into over 100 languages by using our translator app.
New Offline Mode allows you to translate abroad without paying expensive roaming charges.

Translate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world.

FEATURES
• Text translator: Get free translation for text in over 100 languages.
• Translate text to speech: Listen to translation in male or female voices.
• Switch between different dialects when you translate.
• Dictionary & Thesaurus for all languages.
• Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more.
• Photo translator: With Translator, you can use your camera to translate menus, signs, and more instantly.
• Offline translation: Translate in over 40 Languages without an Internet connection.
• Voice translator: Translate Voice-to-Voice conversation and speech.
• Verb conjugations in different tenses.

Translate Translator supports languages & dialects:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sesotho, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

LOVED AND TRUSTED BY MILLIONS

long.fi:
Tämä kääntäjä on jokapäiväinen apulainen kääntääksesi tuntemattoman vieraan sanan, lauseen tai koko artikkelin. Se on yksinkertainen ja nopea tapa kääntää tekstiä toiselle kielelle irtautumatta töistä.

Käännä samalla kun luet ja kirjoitat Web Translatella, joka on maailman tarkin kääntäjä.

Tämän kääntäjän avulla voit nauttia Google-kääntäjän lyömättömästä käännöslaadusta poistumatta selaimesta.

Pystyt kääntämään vaivattomasti ja välittömästi mitä tahansa luet tai kirjoitat Chromessa. Valitse mitä tahansa tekstiä ja napsauta sitä hiiren kakkospainikkeella ja käännä tämä valinta.

Kielimuurin vuoksi sinun ei enää tarvitse huolehtia siitä, että tietoja katoaa verkossa.

Lataa Chromen kääntäjä ilmaiseksi ja aloita kääntäminen jo tänään.

TULEVAISUUS

Käännä lukiessasi
Opi kieltä lukemalla mitä haluat. Käännä sanoja ja lauseita livenä millä tahansa verkkosivulla. Napsauta minkä tahansa sivuston sanoja tai lauseita kääntääksesi ne.

Käännä kirjoituksesi
Kääntäjän avulla voit kirjoittaa sisältösi ponnahdusikkunan yläosaan ja saada käännöksen alareunaan. Kaikki käännökset (kuten ranska, saksa, espanja, arabia ja yhdeksänkymmentäseitsemän muuta kieltä) perustuvat Google-kääntäjän konekäännöksiin, jotka kääntävät sisältösi tarkasti.

Kaksoisnapsauta käännöstä
Pystyt kääntämään kaksoisnapsauttamalla saadaksesi sanojen nopean käännöksen.

Teksti puheeksi
Käytä TTS-toimintoa, joka auttaa sinua oppimaan sanojen kuulostamisen sekä foneettisen transkription.

Koko sivun käännökset
Käännä kokonaisia verkkosivuja haluamallesi kielelle yhdellä napsautuksella. Tämä on uusi ominaisuus, jonka Google Translator tarjoaa ilmaiseksi ja jonka integroimme kääntäjään.

Käännöshistoria
Kaikki käännöshistoria tallennetaan selaimesi paikalliseen tallennustilaan. Voit etsiä tai poistaa käännöshistoriasi napsauttamalla laajennuskuvaketta selaimen oikeassa yläkulmassa. Napsauta sitten "Näytä käännöshistoria" -kuvaketta ponnahdusikkunassa. Tämä kääntäjä ei käytä pilvitallennustilaa. Siksi laajennuksen poistamisen jälkeen kaikki käännöshistoriasi poistetaan selaimen paikallisesta tallennustilasta ilman palautusmahdollisuutta.

With this extension, you can quickly translate words on the web page you are viewing using a Google translator.

To do this, just right-click on the text or word you need and click on "Simple Translator" next to it. In a new tab, you will see the result.

You can also set your language in the extension settings. The translator will determine the language of the site where you are located.

You can translate between the following languages

Using "Web Translator" means that you agree to these terms.

Convenient translator with two options: translate the text using double click to the word during the reading or copy and paste a big part of text to the popup of extension.

long.fr:
Ce traducteur est votre aide quotidienne pour traduire un mot étranger inconnu, une phrase ou un article entier. C'est un moyen simple et rapide de traduire du texte dans une autre langue sans s'éloigner du travail.

Traduisez pendant que vous lisez et écrivez avec Web Translate, le traducteur le plus précis au monde.

Avec ce traducteur, vous pouvez profiter de la qualité de traduction imbattable de Google Translate sans quitter votre navigateur.

Vous pourrez traduire sans effort et instantanément tout ce que vous lisez ou écrivez dans Chrome. Sélectionnez et faites un clic droit sur n'importe quel texte et choisissez de traduire cette sélection.

En raison de la barrière de la langue, vous n'avez plus à vous soucier de manquer des informations sur le Web.

Téléchargez le traducteur pour Chrome gratuitement pour commencer à traduire dès aujourd'hui.

FUTUR

Traduire en lisant
Apprenez une langue en lisant ce que vous aimez. Traduisez des mots et des phrases en direct sur n'importe quelle page Web. Cliquez sur des mots ou des phrases sur n'importe quel site pour les traduire.

Traduisez votre écriture
Avec le traducteur, vous pouvez écrire votre contenu en haut de la fenêtre contextuelle et obtenir la traduction en bas. Toutes les traductions (comme le français, l'allemand, l'espagnol, l'arabe et quatre-vingt-dix-sept autres langues) sont alimentées par des traductions automatiques neuronales de Google Translate qui traduisent avec précision votre contenu.

Traduction par double-clic
Vous pourrez traduire en double-cliquant pour obtenir une traduction rapide des mots.

Texte pour parler
Utilisez la fonction TTS qui vous aide à apprendre le son des mots ainsi que la transcription phonétique.

Traductions pleine page
Traduisez des pages Web entières dans la langue de votre choix en un seul clic. Il s'agit d'une nouvelle fonctionnalité fournie gratuitement par Google Translator que nous avons intégrée à notre traducteur.

Historique de la traduction
Tout l'historique des traductions est stocké dans le stockage local de votre navigateur. Pour rechercher ou supprimer votre historique de traduction, cliquez sur l'icône d'extension dans le coin supérieur droit de votre navigateur. Cliquez ensuite sur l'icône "Afficher l'historique des traductions" dans la fenêtre contextuelle. Ce traducteur n'utilise aucun stockage en nuage. Par conséquent, après la suppression de l'extension, tout votre historique de traduction sera supprimé du stockage local du navigateur sans possibilité de récupération.

long.hr:
S ovim proširenjem možete brzo prevesti riječi na web stranici koju gledate pomoću Google prevoditelja.

Da biste to učinili, samo kliknite desnom tipkom miša na tekst ili riječ koja vam je potrebna i kliknite na "Jednostavan prevoditelj" pored nje. U novoj kartici vidjet ćete rezultat.

Također možete postaviti svoj jezik u postavkama proširenja. Prevoditelj će odrediti jezik stranice na kojoj se nalazite.

Možete prevoditi između sljedećih jezika

Politika privatnosti:
Koristite chrome proširenje "Simple tanslator" na vlastitu odgovornost. Jamstvo nije dostupno.
Autor nije odgovoran za bilo kakvu štetu ili gubitak podataka uzrokovan korištenjem ovog proširenja.
Korištenje "prevoditelja" znači da se slažete s ovim uvjetima.

Poricanje odgovornosti:
Chromeovo proširenje "prevoditelj" nema nikakve veze s popularnim mjestom https://translate.google.com
Sva autorska prava pripadaju njihovim vlasnicima.
Google ne podržava niti sponzorira ovo Chromeovo proširenje.
Ovo proširenje za Chrome nije u vlasništvu, licenci ili podružnici Google Inc.

Sva autorska prava pripadaju njihovim vlasnicima.

Prevoditelj web stranica, trenutni prijevod odabranog teksta, prijevod u skočnom prozoru, podržava 103 jezika, ugrađeni TTS za pretvaranje teksta u govor.
Web prevoditelj je vrhunski prevoditelj za vaše potrebe pregledavanja weba. Ovo proširenje nudi trenutni prijevod odabranog teksta jednim klikom, pružajući jednostavan i brz način prevođenja web stranica.

S podrškom za 103 jezika, ovaj prevoditelj vas pokriva bez obzira gdje idete na webu. Značajka prevođenja u skočnom prozoru uklanja potrebu za napuštanjem stranice ili kopiranjem i lijepljenjem teksta u poseban alat za prevođenje.

Ugrađena funkcija pretvaranja teksta u govor (TTS) dodaje potpuno novu razinu pogodnosti vašem iskustvu prevođenja web stranice. Bilo da ste putnik, student ili jednostavno netko tko želi razumjeti sadržaj na stranom jeziku, Web prevoditelj je najbolji prevoditelj za vas.

Ovo proširenje je jednostavno za korištenje i jednostavno za korištenje. Jednostavno odaberite tekst koji želite prevesti i skočni prozor s prijevodom pojavit će se u tren oka.

Ugrađena TTS funkcija pruža audio verziju prevedenog teksta, što ga čini idealnim za one koji više vole slušati umjesto čitati.

Pretražujte web s povjerenjem i jednostavno prevedite svaki tekst na koji naiđete. Proces prevođenja je brz i točan, što osigurava da dobijete najtočniji mogući prijevod.

Nadalje, ovo proširenje je vrlo prilagodljivo, što vam omogućuje da odaberete željeni jezik za prijevod i prilagodite druge postavke kako bi odgovarale vašim potrebama. Bez obzira koristite li ga u poslovne, obrazovne ili osobne svrhe, ovo proširenje učinit će vaše iskustvo pregledavanja interneta lakšim i učinkovitijim.

Dakle, ako tražite pouzdanog i učinkovitog prevoditelja web stranica, ne tražite dalje od ovog alata za prevođenje. Nabavite ga sada i počnite uživati u besprijekornom prijevodu bez napora na webu.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

Translate while reading

Full-page translations

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.

long.hu:
Ezzel a bővítménnyel gyorsan lefordíthatja a megtekintett weboldal szavait egy Google fordító segítségével.

Ehhez kattintson a jobb gombbal a kívánt szövegre vagy szóra, és kattintson a mellette lévő "Egyszerű fordító" elemre. Egy új lapon látni fogja az eredményt.

A nyelvet a bővítmény beállításaiban is megadhatja. A fordító meghatározza annak a webhelynek a nyelvét, ahol Ön tartózkodik.

A következő nyelvek között fordíthat

Adatvédelmi irányelvek:
A krómozott "Simple tanslator" bővítményt saját felelősségére használja. Garancia nem áll rendelkezésre.
A szerző nem vállal felelősséget a bővítmény használatából eredő károkért vagy adatvesztésekért.
A „fordító” használata azt jelenti, hogy Ön elfogadja ezeket a feltételeket.

A felelősség megtagadása:
A "fordító" Chrome-bővítménynek nincs köze a https://translate.google.com népszerű webhelyhez
Minden szerzői jog a megfelelő tulajdonosokat illeti.
A Google nem támogatja és nem szponzorálja ezt a Chrome-bővítményt.
Ez a Chrome-bővítmény nem a Google Inc. tulajdona, nem rendelkezik engedéllyel vagy leányvállalata.

Minden szerzői jog a tulajdonosokat illeti.

Weboldal fordító, azonnal lefordítja a kiválasztott szöveget, előugró fordítás, 103 nyelvet támogat, beépített szövegfelolvasó TTS.
A webfordító a legjobb fordító az Ön webböngészési igényeihez. Ez a bővítmény egyetlen kattintással azonnali fordítást tesz lehetővé a kiválasztott szöveghez, így könnyedén és gyorsan lefordíthatja a weboldalakat.

A 103 nyelv támogatásával ez a fordító mindenhol lefedheti Önt, bárhová is megy az interneten. A felugró fordítási funkció szükségtelenné teszi az oldal elhagyását vagy a szöveg másolását és beillesztését egy külön fordítóeszközbe.

A beépített text-to-speech (TTS) funkció a kényelem egy teljesen új szintjét növeli a weboldal fordítási élményében. Legyen szó utazóról, diákról vagy egyszerűen valakiről, aki meg akarja érteni az idegen nyelvű tartalmat, a webfordító a legjobb fordító az Ön számára.

Ez a bővítmény felhasználóbarát és könnyen használható. Egyszerűen válassza ki a lefordítani kívánt szöveget, és a felugró fordítás pillanatok alatt megjelenik.

A beépített TTS funkció a lefordított szöveg hangos változatát biztosítja, így ideális azok számára, akik olvasás helyett inkább hallgatnak.

Böngésszen magabiztosan az interneten, és egyszerűen fordítson le bármilyen szöveget, amellyel találkozik. A fordítási folyamat gyors és pontos, így Ön a lehető legpontosabb fordítást kapja.

Ezenkívül ez a bővítmény nagymértékben testreszabható, lehetővé téve, hogy kiválaszthassa a kívánt fordítási nyelvet, és az Ön igényei szerint módosítsa az egyéb beállításokat. Akár üzleti, akár oktatási vagy személyes célokra használja, ez a bővítmény gördülékenyebbé és hatékonyabbá teszi a webböngészést.

Tehát, ha megbízható és hatékony weboldal-fordítót keres, ne keressen tovább ennél a fordítóeszköznél. Szerezze be most, és élvezze a zökkenőmentes és könnyed fordítást az interneten.

All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.


Translator is a language translator extension for text, voice, conversations. You can easily translate into over 100 languages by using our translator app.
New Offline Mode allows you to translate abroad without paying expensive roaming charges.

Translate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world.

FEATURES

• Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more.

LOVED AND TRUSTED BY MILLIONS

In search of a powerful language translator?

Introducing Lingvanex Translator, your superior language translator & language learning app. Use our practical voice translator, call translator or image translator to translate conversations, SMS messages, calls, conference chats, or just phrases you need at the moment.

🔄ALL FEATURES IN DETAIL:

long.it:
Questo traduttore è il tuo aiuto quotidiano per tradurre una parola straniera sconosciuta, una frase o un intero articolo. È un modo semplice e veloce per tradurre il testo in un'altra lingua senza interrompere il lavoro.

Traduci mentre leggi e scrivi con Web Translate, il traduttore più preciso al mondo.

Con questo traduttore, puoi goderti l'imbattibile qualità di traduzione di Google translate senza uscire dal tuo browser.

Sarai in grado di tradurre senza sforzo e all'istante qualsiasi cosa tu stia leggendo o scrivendo in Chrome. Seleziona e fai clic con il pulsante destro del mouse su qualsiasi testo e scegli di tradurre questa selezione.

A causa di una barriera linguistica, non devi più preoccuparti di perdere alcuna informazione in tutto il web.

Scarica gratuitamente il traduttore per Chrome per iniziare a tradurre oggi stesso.

FUTURO

Tradurre durante la lettura
Impara una lingua leggendo quello che vuoi. Traduci parole e frasi dal vivo su qualsiasi pagina web. Fai clic su parole o frasi su qualsiasi sito per tradurle.

Traduci la tua scrittura
Con il traduttore, puoi scrivere il tuo contenuto nella parte superiore del pop-up e ottenere la traduzione nella parte inferiore. Tutte le traduzioni (come francese, tedesco, spagnolo, arabo e altre novantasette lingue) sono alimentate da traduzioni automatiche neurali di Google Translate che traduce accuratamente i tuoi contenuti.

Traduzione con doppio clic
Sarai in grado di tradurre con un doppio clic per ottenere una rapida traduzione delle parole.

Sintesi vocale
Usa la funzione TTS che ti aiuta a imparare come suonano le parole e la trascrizione fonetica.

Traduzioni a tutta pagina
Traduci intere pagine Web nella lingua desiderata con un solo clic. Questa è una nuova funzionalità fornita gratuitamente da Google Translator che abbiamo integrato nel nostro traduttore.

Storia della traduzione
Tutta la cronologia delle traduzioni è memorizzata nella memoria locale del tuo browser. Per trovare o eliminare la cronologia delle traduzioni, fai clic sull'icona dell'estensione nell'angolo in alto a destra del browser. Quindi fai clic sull'icona "Mostra cronologia traduzioni" nella finestra pop-up. Questo traduttore non utilizza alcun archivio cloud. Pertanto, dopo aver rimosso l'estensione, tutta la cronologia delle traduzioni verrà eliminata dalla memoria locale del browser senza possibilità di recupero.
long.ja:
この翻訳者は、未知の外国語、文、または記事全体を翻訳するための毎日のヘルパーです。 仕事を中断することなく、テキストを別の言語に翻訳する簡単で迅速な方法です。

世界で最も正確な翻訳者である Web Translate を使用して、読み書きしながら翻訳します。

この翻訳者を使用すると、ブラウザーを離れることなく、Google 翻訳の比類のない翻訳品質を楽しむことができます。

Chrome で読み書きしているものは何でも、簡単かつ瞬時に翻訳できます。 任意のテキストを選択して右クリックし、この選択を翻訳することを選択します。

言葉の壁が原因で、ウェブ全体で情報を見逃す心配はもうありません。

Chrome 用の翻訳者を無料でダウンロードして、今日から翻訳を始めましょう。

将来

読みながら翻訳
好きなものを読んで言語を学びましょう。 単語やフレーズを Web ページ上でリアルタイムに翻訳します。 サイトの単語やフレーズをクリックして翻訳します。

あなたの文章を翻訳する
翻訳者を使用すると、ポップアップの上部にコンテンツを書き込み、下部に翻訳を表示できます。 すべての翻訳 (フランス語、ドイツ語、スペイン語、アラビア語、その他 97 の言語など) は、コンテンツを正確に翻訳する Google 翻訳によるニューラル機械翻訳によって強化されています。

ダブルクリック翻訳
ダブルクリックで翻訳して、単語をすばやく翻訳できます。

テキスト読み上げ
TTS 機能を使用すると、単語の発音と音声表記を学習できます。

全ページ翻訳
ワンクリックでウェブページ全体をご希望の言語に翻訳します。 これは、Google 翻訳者が無料で提供する新機能で、翻訳者に統合されています。

翻訳履歴
すべての翻訳履歴は、ブラウザのローカル ストレージに保存されます。 翻訳履歴を検索または削除するには、ブラウザの右上隅にある拡張機能のアイコンをクリックします。 次に、ポップアップ ウィンドウの [翻訳履歴を表示] アイコンをクリックします。 この翻訳者は、クラウド ストレージを使用しません。 そのため、拡張機能を削除すると、すべての翻訳履歴がブラウザのローカル ストレージから削除され、復元することはできなくなります。
long.ko:
이 번역가는 모르는 외국어 단어, 문장 또는 전체 기사를 번역하는 일상 도우미입니다. 작업을 중단하지 않고 텍스트를 다른 언어로 번역하는 간단하고 빠른 방법입니다.

세계에서 가장 정확한 번역기인 웹 번역으로 읽고 쓰면서 번역하세요.

이 번역기를 사용하면 브라우저를 종료하지 않고도 Google 번역의 탁월한 번역 품질을 즐길 수 있습니다.

Chrome에서 읽고 쓰는 내용을 쉽고 빠르게 번역할 수 있습니다. 텍스트를 선택하고 마우스 오른쪽 버튼으로 클릭하고 이 선택 항목을 번역하도록 선택합니다.

언어 장벽으로 인해 더 이상 웹 전체에서 누락된 정보에 대해 걱정할 필요가 없습니다.

오늘 번역을 시작하려면 Chrome용 번역기를 무료로 다운로드하세요.

미래

읽는 동안 번역
당신이 좋아하는 것을 읽고 언어를 배우십시오. 모든 웹 페이지에서 실시간으로 단어 및 구를 번역합니다. 사이트에서 단어나 구를 클릭하여 번역하세요.

당신의 글을 번역하세요
번역기를 사용하면 팝업 상단에 내용을 작성하고 하단에서 번역을 받을 수 있습니다. 모든 번역(예: 프랑스어, 독일어, 스페인어, 아랍어 및 기타 97개 언어)은 콘텐츠를 정확하게 번역하는 Google 번역의 신경망 기계 번역에 의해 구동됩니다.

더블 클릭 번역
단어를 빠르게 번역하려면 더블 클릭으로 번역할 수 있습니다.

텍스트 음성 변환
단어의 소리와 음성 표기를 학습하는 데 도움이 되는 TTS 기능을 사용하세요.

전체 페이지 번역
클릭 한 번으로 전체 웹 페이지를 원하는 언어로 번역하세요. 이것은 우리가 번역기에 통합한 Google 번역기에서 무료로 제공하는 새로운 기능입니다.

번역 역사
모든 번역 기록은 브라우저의 로컬 저장소에 저장됩니다. 번역 기록을 찾거나 삭제하려면 브라우저 오른쪽 상단에 있는 확장 프로그램 아이콘을 클릭하세요. 그런 다음 팝업 창에서 "번역 기록 표시" 아이콘을 클릭합니다. 이 번역기는 클라우드 저장소를 사용하지 않습니다. 따라서 확장 프로그램을 제거한 후에는 모든 번역 기록이 복구 가능성 없이 브라우저의 로컬 저장소에서 삭제됩니다.
long.lt:
Šis vertėjas yra jūsų kasdienis pagalbininkas išversti nežinomą svetimžodį, sakinį ar visą straipsnį. Tai paprastas ir greitas būdas išversti tekstą į kitą kalbą neatitrūkstant nuo darbo.

Verskite skaitydami ir rašydami naudodami Web Translate – tiksliausią pasaulyje vertėją.

Naudodami šį vertėją galite mėgautis neprilygstama Google vertėjo vertimo kokybe neišeidami iš naršyklės.

Galėsite be vargo ir akimirksniu išversti viską, ką skaitote ar rašote naudodami „Chrome“. Pasirinkite ir dešiniuoju pelės mygtuku spustelėkite bet kurį tekstą ir pasirinkite išversti šį pasirinkimą.

Dėl kalbos barjero nebereikia jaudintis, kad žiniatinklyje trūksta informacijos.

Atsisiųskite „Chrome“ skirtą vertėją nemokamai ir pradėkite versti šiandien.

ATEITIS

Išverskite skaitydami
Išmokite kalbos skaitydami tai, kas jums patinka. Išverskite žodžius ir frazes tiesiogiai bet kuriame tinklalapyje. Spustelėkite žodžius ar frazes bet kurioje svetainėje, kad juos išverstumėte.

Išverskite savo raštą
Naudodami vertėją galite įrašyti turinį iššokančiojo lango viršuje, o vertimą gauti apačioje. Visi vertimai (pvz., prancūzų, vokiečių, ispanų, arabų ir devyniasdešimt septynių kitų kalbų) atliekami naudojant „Google“ vertėjo neuroninius mašininius vertimus, kurie tiksliai išverčia jūsų turinį.

Dukart spustelėkite vertimą
Galėsite išversti dukart spustelėję, kad greitai išverstumėte žodžius.

Iš rašto į kalbą
Naudokite TTS funkciją, kuri padeda sužinoti, kaip skamba žodžiai ir fonetinė transkripcija.

Viso puslapio vertimai
Vienu paspaudimu išverskite visus tinklalapius į norimą kalbą. Tai nauja funkcija, kurią nemokamai teikia „Google“ vertėjas, kurią integravome į savo vertėją.

Vertimų istorija
Visa vertimo istorija saugoma jūsų naršyklės vietinėje saugykloje. Norėdami rasti arba ištrinti vertimo istoriją, spustelėkite plėtinio piktogramą viršutiniame dešiniajame naršyklės kampe. Tada iššokančiajame lange spustelėkite piktogramą „Rodyti vertimo istoriją“. Šis vertėjas nenaudoja jokios debesies saugyklos. Todėl pašalinus plėtinį visa vertimo istorija bus ištrinta iš naršyklės vietinės saugyklos be galimybės atkurti.
long.lv:
Šis tulkotājs ir jūsu ikdienas palīgs, lai tulkotu nezināmu svešvārdu, teikumu vai visu rakstu. Tas ir vienkāršs un ātrs veids, kā tulkot tekstu citā valodā, neatraujoties no darba.

Tulko, lasot un rakstot, izmantojot Web Translate — pasaulē precīzāko tulkotāju.

Izmantojot šo tulkotāju, varat baudīt nepārspējamu Google tulkotāja tulkošanas kvalitāti, neizejot no pārlūkprogrammas.

Jūs varēsiet bez piepūles un nekavējoties tulkot visu, ko lasāt vai rakstāt pārlūkā Chrome. Atlasiet un ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet uz jebkura teksta un izvēlieties tulkot šo atlasi.

Valodas barjeras dēļ jums vairs nav jāuztraucas par informācijas trūkumu visā tīmeklī.

Lejupielādējiet Chrome tulkotāju bez maksas, lai sāktu tulkošanu jau šodien.

NĀKOTNE

Tulko lasīšanas laikā
Mācieties valodu, lasot visu, kas jums patīk. Tulkojiet vārdus un frāzes tiešraidē jebkurā tīmekļa lapā. Noklikšķiniet uz vārdiem vai frāzēm jebkurā vietnē, lai tos tulkotu.

Tulko savu rakstīto
Izmantojot tulkotāju, varat rakstīt savu saturu uznirstošā loga augšdaļā un saņemt tulkojumu apakšā. Visus tulkojumus (piemēram, franču, vācu, spāņu, arābu un deviņdesmit septiņās citās valodās) nodrošina Google tulkotāja neironu mašīntulkojumi, kas precīzi pārtulko jūsu saturu.

Veiciet dubultklikšķi uz tulkojumu
Jūs varēsiet tulkot, veicot dubultklikšķi, lai ātri tulkotu vārdus.

No teksta uz izrunu
Izmantojiet TTS funkciju, kas palīdz uzzināt, kā skan vārdi, kā arī fonētisko transkripciju.

Pilnas lapas tulkojumi
Tulkojiet visas tīmekļa lapas vēlamajā valodā tikai ar vienu klikšķi. Šī ir jauna funkcija, ko Google tulkotājs nodrošina bez maksas un ko mēs integrējām savā tulkā.

Tulkošanas vēsture
Visa tulkojumu vēsture tiek saglabāta jūsu pārlūkprogrammas lokālajā krātuvē. Lai atrastu vai dzēstu savu tulkošanas vēsturi, pārlūkprogrammas augšējā labajā stūrī noklikšķiniet uz paplašinājuma ikonas. Pēc tam uznirstošajā logā noklikšķiniet uz ikonas "Rādīt tulkošanas vēsturi". Šis tulkotājs neizmanto mākoņkrātuvi. Tāpēc pēc paplašinājuma noņemšanas visa tulkošanas vēsture tiks dzēsta no pārlūkprogrammas lokālās krātuves bez atkopšanas iespējas.

translator for Chrome best and easiest way to quickly translate part of the content that you need, such as words, phrases, or even menu items.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them.

Text-to-speech

Full-page translations

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

long.nl:
Deze vertaler is je dagelijkse hulp bij het vertalen van een onbekend buitenlands woord, zin of heel artikel. Het is een eenvoudige en snelle manier om tekst in een andere taal te vertalen zonder het werk te onderbreken.

Vertaal terwijl u leest en schrijft met Web Translate, 's werelds meest nauwkeurige vertaler.

Met deze vertaler kunt u genieten van de onverslaanbare vertaalkwaliteit van Google translate zonder uw browser te verlaten.

U kunt moeiteloos en direct vertalen wat u leest of schrijft in Chrome. Selecteer en klik met de rechtermuisknop op een willekeurige tekst en kies ervoor om deze selectie te vertalen.

Vanwege een taalbarrière hoeft u zich geen zorgen meer te maken over het missen van informatie op internet.

Download vertaler voor Chrome gratis en begin vandaag nog met vertalen.

TOEKOMST

Vertalen tijdens het lezen
Leer een taal door te lezen wat je maar wilt. Vertaal woorden en zinnen live op elke webpagina. Klik op woorden of woordgroepen op een site om ze te vertalen.

Vertaal je schrijven
Met de vertaler kunt u uw inhoud bovenaan de pop-up schrijven en de vertaling onderaan krijgen. Alle vertalingen (zoals Frans, Duits, Spaans, Arabisch en zevenennegentig andere talen) worden mogelijk gemaakt door neurale machinevertalingen van Google Translate die uw inhoud nauwkeurig vertalen.

Dubbelklik vertaling
U kunt vertalen door te dubbelklikken om een snelle vertaling van woorden te krijgen.

Tekst naar spraak
Gebruik de TTS-functie die u helpt te leren hoe woorden klinken, evenals fonetische transcriptie.

Paginagrote vertalingen
Vertaal volledige webpagina's in de door u gewenste taal met slechts één klik. Dit is een nieuwe functie die gratis wordt aangeboden door Google Translator en die we in onze vertaler hebben geïntegreerd.

Vertaalgeschiedenis
Alle vertaalgeschiedenis wordt opgeslagen in de lokale opslag van uw browser. Om uw vertaalgeschiedenis te vinden of te verwijderen, klikt u op het extensiepictogram in de rechterbovenhoek van uw browser. Klik vervolgens op het pictogram "Toon vertaalgeschiedenis" in het pop-upvenster. Deze vertaler gebruikt geen cloudopslag. Daarom wordt na het verwijderen van de extensie al uw vertaalgeschiedenis verwijderd uit de lokale opslag van de browser zonder de mogelijkheid van herstel.
long.no:
Denne oversetteren er din daglige hjelper til å oversette et ukjent fremmedord, setning eller hele artikkelen. Det er en enkel og rask måte å oversette tekst til et annet språk uten å løsrive seg fra jobben.

Oversett mens du leser og skriver med Web Translate, verdens mest nøyaktige oversetter.

Med denne oversetteren kan du nyte Google translate uslåelig oversettelseskvalitet uten å forlate nettleseren.

Du vil enkelt og umiddelbart kunne oversette det du leser eller skriver i Chrome. Velg og høyreklikk på en tekst og velg å oversette dette utvalget.

På grunn av en språkbarriere trenger du ikke lenger bekymre deg for å gå glipp av informasjon på hele nettet.

Last ned oversetter for Chrome gratis for å begynne å oversette i dag.

FRAMTID

Oversett mens du leser
Lær et språk ved å lese hva du vil. Oversett ord og uttrykk direkte på alle nettsider. Klikk på ord eller uttrykk på et hvilket som helst nettsted for å oversette dem.

Oversett det du skriver
Med oversetteren kan du skrive innholdet ditt øverst i popup-vinduet og få oversettelsen nederst. Alle oversettelser (som fransk, tysk, spansk, arabisk og nittisju andre språk) er drevet av nevrale maskinoversettelser fra Google Translate som nøyaktig oversetter innholdet ditt.

Dobbeltklikk oversettelse
Du vil kunne oversette ved å dobbeltklikke for å få en rask oversettelse av ord.

Tekst til tale
Bruk TTS-funksjonen som hjelper deg å lære hvordan ord høres ut samt fonetisk transkripsjon.

Helsides oversettelser
Oversett hele nettsider til ønsket språk med bare ett klikk. Dette er en ny funksjon fra Google Translator gratis som vi integrerte i oversetteren vår.

Oversettelseshistorie
All oversettelseshistorikk lagres i nettleserens lokale lagring. For å finne eller slette oversettelsesloggen din, klikk på utvidelsesikonet øverst til høyre i nettleseren din. Klikk deretter på "Vis oversettelseshistorikk"-ikonet i popup-vinduet. Denne oversetteren bruker ikke skylagring. Derfor, etter at du har fjernet utvidelsen, vil all din oversettelseshistorikk bli slettet fra nettleserens lokale lagring uten mulighet for gjenoppretting.
long.pl:
Ten tłumacz jest Twoim codziennym pomocnikiem w tłumaczeniu nieznanego obcego słowa, zdania lub całego artykułu. To prosty i szybki sposób na przetłumaczenie tekstu na inny język bez odrywania się od pracy.

Tłumacz podczas czytania i pisania za pomocą Tłumacza internetowego, najdokładniejszego tłumacza na świecie.

Dzięki temu tłumaczowi możesz cieszyć się niezrównaną jakością tłumaczeń Google bez opuszczania przeglądarki.

Będziesz mógł bez wysiłku i natychmiast tłumaczyć wszystko, co czytasz lub piszesz w Chrome. Zaznacz i kliknij prawym przyciskiem myszy dowolny tekst i wybierz opcję przetłumaczenia tego zaznaczenia.

Ze względu na barierę językową nie musisz się już martwić, że brakuje jakichkolwiek informacji w sieci.

Pobierz tłumacza dla Chrome za darmo, aby zacząć tłumaczyć już dziś.

PRZYSZŁY

Tłumacz podczas czytania
Ucz się języka, czytając, co chcesz. Tłumacz słowa i wyrażenia na żywo na dowolnej stronie internetowej. Kliknij słowa lub frazy w dowolnej witrynie, aby je przetłumaczyć.

Przetłumacz swój tekst
Dzięki tłumaczowi możesz napisać treść na górze wyskakującego okienka i uzyskać tłumaczenie na dole. Wszystkie tłumaczenia (takie jak francuski, niemiecki, hiszpański, arabski i dziewięćdziesiąt siedem innych języków) są oparte na neuronowych tłumaczeniach maszynowych Tłumacza Google, które dokładnie tłumaczą Twoje treści.

Podwójne kliknięcie tłumaczenia
Będziesz mógł tłumaczyć po dwukrotnym kliknięciu, aby uzyskać szybkie tłumaczenie słów.

Tekst na mowę
Skorzystaj z funkcji TTS, która pomoże Ci nauczyć się brzmienia słów oraz transkrypcji fonetycznej.

Tłumaczenia całostronicowe
Przetłumacz całe strony internetowe na wybrany język za pomocą jednego kliknięcia. Jest to nowa funkcja udostępniana bezpłatnie przez Tłumacza Google, którą zintegrowaliśmy z naszym tłumaczem.

Historia tłumaczeń
Cała historia tłumaczeń jest przechowywana w lokalnej pamięci Twojej przeglądarki. Aby znaleźć lub usunąć historię tłumaczeń, kliknij ikonę rozszerzenia w prawym górnym rogu przeglądarki. Następnie kliknij ikonę „Pokaż historię tłumaczeń” w wyskakującym oknie. Ten tłumacz nie korzysta z żadnego miejsca w chmurze. Dlatego po usunięciu rozszerzenia cała historia tłumaczeń zostanie usunięta z lokalnego magazynu przeglądarki bez możliwości przywrócenia.
